mapper.insert: insert into log_dto ( logid, hash, filehash, fullpath, filename, createdby, createddate, updatedby, updateddate, doctype, doccode, fileopt ) values ( log_dto_seq.nextval, #{logid}, #{hash}, #{filehash}, #{fullpath}, #{filename}, #{createdby}, #{createddate}, #{updatedby}, #{updateddate}, #{doctype}, #{doccode}, #{fileopt} )
